fareRules.title: Application and Other Conditions APP
fareRules.text:
APPLICATION AND OTHER CONDITIONS
RULE - 021/7101
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
BRITISH AIRWAYS PLUS FARE BETWEEN UNITED KINGDOM  AND
EUROPE
APPLICATION
AREA
THESE FARES APPLY
BETWEEN UNITED KINGDOM AND EUROPE.
CLASS OF SERVICE
THESE FARES APPLY FOR ECONOMY CLASS SERVICE.
TYPES OF TRANSPORTATION
THIS RULE GOVERNS ONE-WAY AND ROUND-TRIP FARES.
FARES GOVERNED BY THIS RULE CAN BE USED TO CREATE
ONE-WAY/ROUND-TRIP/OPEN-JAW JOURNEYS.
FARES ONLY APPLY IF PURCHASED BEFORE DEPARTURE.
EXCEPTION
MAY BE USED FOR EN-ROUTE UPGRADING FROM A LOWER
FARE PROVIDED ALL CONDITIONS OF THSES FARES ARE ME
WHEN COMBINING ON A HALF ROUNDTRIP BASIS THE FARE
RULES FOR EACH SECTOR BOOKED APPLY
CAPACITY LIMITATIONS
THE CARRIER SHALL LIMIT THE NUMBER OF PASSENGERS CARRIED
ON ANY ONE FLIGHT AT FARES GOVERNED BY THIS RULE AND SUCH
FARES WILL NOT NECESSARILY BE AVAILABLE ON ALL FLIGHTS.
THE NUMBER OF SEATS WHICH THE CARRIER SHALL MAKE
AVAILABLE ON A GIVEN FLIGHT WILL BE DETERMINED BY THE
CARRIERS BEST JUDGMENT
OTHER CONDITIONS
FARES GOVERNED BY THIS RULE MAY BELONG TO BRITISH
AIRWAYS SEMI-FLEX FARE FAMILY FOR ELIGIBLE POINT-
TO-POINT JOURNEYS. CONTACT BRITISH AIRWAYS FOR
DETAILS.

fareRules.title: Flight Application FLT
fareRules.text:
FLIGHT APPLICATION
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
THE FARE COMPONENT MUST NOT BE ON
ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING
BA FLIGHTS 2046 THROUGH 2060.
AND
THE FARE COMPONENT MUST NOT BE ON
ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING
BA FLIGHTS 2070 THROUGH 2129.
AND
THE FARE COMPONENT MUST NOT BE ON
ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING
BA FLIGHTS 2132 THROUGH 2133.
AND

ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING
BA FLIGHTS 2138 THROUGH 2199.
AND

ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING
BA FLIGHTS 2210 THROUGH 2229.
AND
THE FARE COMPONENT MUST NOT BE ON
ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING
BA FLIGHTS 2240 THROUGH 2249.
AND
THE FARE COMPONENT MUST NOT BE ON
ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING
BA FLIGHTS 2280 THROUGH 2369.
AND
THE FARE COMPONENT MUST NOT BE ON
ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING
BA FLIGHTS 2540 THROUGH 2766.
AND
THE FARE COMPONENT MUST NOT BE ON
ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING
BA FLIGHTS 2779 THROUGH 2799.
AND
THE FARE COMPONENT MUST NOT BE ON
ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING
BA FLIGHTS 3270 THROUGH 3299.
AND
THE FARE COMPONENT MUST NOT BE ON
ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING
BA FLIGHTS 4450 THROUGH 4549.
AND
THE FARE COMPONENT MUST NOT BE ON
ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING
BA FLIGHTS 5900 THROUGH 6099.
AND
THE FARE COMPONENT MUST NOT BE ON
ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING
BA FLIGHTS 7016 THROUGH 7049.
AND
THE FARE COMPONENT MUST NOT BE ON
ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING
BA FLIGHTS 7300 THROUGH 7599.
AND
THE FARE COMPONENT MUST NOT BE ON
ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING
BA FLIGHTS 8040 THROUGH 8999.
AND
THE FARE COMPONENT MUST NOT BE ON
ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING
BA FLIGHTS 9750 THROUGH 9776.
AND
THE FARE COMPONENT MUST INCLUDE TRAVEL FROM/TO/VIA LON VIA
INTERNATIONAL SECTORS ON
ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING
ANY BA FLIGHT
ANY EI FLIGHT
ANY IB FLIGHT
ANY JP FLIGHT
ANY JU FLIGHT
ANY KK FLIGHT
ANY OU FLIGHT
ANY RO FLIGHT
ANY FB FLIGHT
ANY XK FLIGHT
ANY PS FLIGHT
ANY RC FLIGHT.

fareRules.title: Advance Reservations/Ticketing ADV
fareRules.text:
ADVANCE RES/TICKETING
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
RESERVATIONS ARE REQUIRED FOR ALL SECTORS.
TICKETING MUST BE COMPLETED WITHIN 3 DAYS AFTER
RESERVATIONS ARE MADE.

fareRules.title: Stopovers STP
fareRules.text:
STOPOVERS
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
STOPOVERS NOT PERMITTED ON THE FARE COMPONENT.

fareRules.title: Transfers TRF
fareRules.text:
TRANSFERS
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
UNLIMITED TRANSFERS PERMITTED ON THE PRICING UNIT
FARE BREAK AND EMBEDDED SURFACE SECTORS PERMITTED ON THE
FARE COMPONENT.
NOTE -
ONLY PERMITTED AS PROVIDED FOR IN THE SPECIFIED
PUBLISHED ROUTING.

fareRules.title: Permitted Combinations CMB
fareRules.text:
PERMITTED COMBINATIONS
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
APPLICABLE ADD-ON CONSTRUCTION IS ADDRESSED IN
MISCELLANEOUS PROVISIONS - CATEGORY 23.
OPEN JAWS/ROUND TRIPS/CIRCLE TRIPS/END-ON-END
FARES MAY BE COMBINED ON A HALF ROUND TRIP BASIS
-TO FORM SINGLE OR DOUBLE OPEN JAWS.
A MAXIMUM OF TWO INTERNATIONAL FARE COMPONENTS
PERMITTED.
MILEAGE OF THE OPEN SEGMENT MUST BE EQUAL/LESS THAN
MILEAGE OF THE LONGEST FLOWN FARE COMPONENT.
-TO FORM ROUND TRIPS/CIRCLE TRIPS.
END-ON-END COMBINATIONS PERMITTED. VALIDATE ALL FARE
COMPONENTS. SIDE TRIPS NOT PERMITTED.
PROVIDED -
COMBINATIONS ARE WITH ANY FARE FOR CARRIER BA BETWEEN
UNITED KINGDOM/LIBYAN ARAB JAMAHIRIYA
OR FOR CARRIER BA/IB/VY/EI WITHIN EUROPE IN ANY RULE IN
ANY TARIFF
THE FARE COMPONENT MUST BE ON
ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING
ANY IB FLIGHT OPERATED BY IB
ANY IB FLIGHT OPERATED BY BA
ANY IB FLIGHT OPERATED BY VY
ANY IB FLIGHT OPERATED BY EI
ANY EI FLIGHT OPERATED BY EI
ANY EI FLIGHT OPERATED BY BA
ANY EI FLIGHT OPERATED BY IB
ANY BA FLIGHT
ANY VY FLIGHT
ANY 9B FLIGHT
ANY JP FLIGHT OPERATED BY JP
ANY JU FLIGHT OPERATED BY JU
ANY KK FLIGHT OPERATED BY KK
ANY OU FLIGHT OPERATED BY OU
ANY RO FLIGHT OPERATED BY RO
ANY FB FLIGHT OPERATED BY FB
ANY PS FLIGHT OPERATED BY PS
ANY XK FLIGHT OPERATED BY XK
ANY AY FLIGHT OPERATED BY AY.

fareRules.text:

BETWEEN UNITED KINGDOM AND EUROPE
IF INFANT UNDER 02 WITHOUT A SEAT.

OR - PIF UNDER 02.
THERE IS NO CHARGE FOR TRAVEL.
THE PROVISIONS BELOW APPLY ONLY AS FOLLOWS -
SALE IS RESTRICTED TO SPECIFIC AGENTS.
OR - SALE IS RESTRICTED TO SPECIFIC AGENTS.
OR - SALE IS RESTRICTED TO SPECIFIC AGENTS.

THERE IS NO CHARGE FOR TRAVEL.
ORIGINATING UNITED KINGDOM -
FOR TICKETING ON/BEFORE 17SEP 18
A SURCHARGE OF GBP 8.00 PER FARE COMPONENT WILL BE
ADDED TO THE APPLICABLE FARE FOR TRAVEL.
ORIGINATING EUROPE -
FOR TICKETING ON/BEFORE 17SEP 18
A SURCHARGE OF EUR 9.50 PER FARE COMPONENT WILL BE
ADDED TO THE APPLICABLE FARE FOR TRAVEL.
ORIGINATING UNITED KINGDOM -
FOR TICKETING ON/AFTER 18SEP 18
A SURCHARGE OF GBP 9.00 PER FARE COMPONENT WILL BE
ADDED TO THE APPLICABLE FARE FOR TRAVEL.
ORIGINATING EUROPE -
FOR TICKETING ON/AFTER 18SEP 18
A SURCHARGE OF EUR 10.50 PER FARE COMPONENT WILL BE
ADDED TO THE APPLICABLE FARE FOR TRAVEL.

fareRules.title: Sale Restrictions TKT
fareRules.text:
SALES RESTRICTIONS
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
TICKETS MUST BE ISSUED ON BA OR IB.
TICKETS MAY NOT BE ISSUED BY PTA. TICKETS MUST BE ISSUED
BY ELECTRONIC TICKETING. EXTENSION OF TICKET VALIDITY IS
NOT PERMITTED.
OR - TICKETS MUST BE ISSUED ON BA OR AY.
TICKETS MAY NOT BE ISSUED BY PTA. TICKETS MUST BE
ISSUED BY ELECTRONIC TICKETING. EXTENSION OF TICKET
VALIDITY IS NOT PERMITTED.
OR - TICKETS MUST BE ISSUED ON BA OR EI.
TICKETS MAY NOT BE ISSUED BY PTA. TICKETS MUST BE
ISSUED BY ELECTRONIC TICKETING. EXTENSION OF TICKET
VALIDITY IS NOT PERMITTED.
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
TICKETS MAY NOT BE SOLD IN ANGOLA/VENEZUELA/ZIMBABWE/
IRAN,ISLAMIC REPUBLIC OF.
TICKETS MAY ONLY BE SOLD IN AREA 1/AREA 2/AREA 3.

fareRules.title: Penalties CHG
fareRules.text:
PENALTIES
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED   NOTE - RULE 7001 IN IPRG100
APPLIES
FROM/TO UNITED KINGDOM
CANCELLATIONS
ANY TIME
TICKET IS NON-REFUNDABLE.
NOTE -
FARE COMPONENT IS NON-REFUNDABLE.
----------------------------------------------
WAIVED FOR DEATH OF A PASSENGER AND PASSENGERS
TRAVELLING COMPANIONS.
----------------------------------------------
WHEN COMBINING NON-REFUNDABLE FARES WITH
REFUNDABLE FARES
1. THE AMOUNT PAID ON EACH REFUNDABLE FARE
COMPONENT IS REFUNDED.
2. THE AMOUNT PAID ON EACH NON-REFUNDABLE FARE
COMPONENT WILL NOT BE REFUNDED.
3. WHEN COMBINING FARES CHARGE THE SUM OF THE
CANCELLATION FEES OF ALL CANCELLED FARE
COMPONENTS.
----------------------------------------------
REFUND OF UNUSED TAXES FEES AND CHARGES PAID TO
THIRD PARTIES PERMITTED. ASSOCIATED CARRIER
IMPOSED CHARGES WILL NOT BE REFUNDED.
----------------------------------------------
REFUND PERMITTED WITHIN TICKET VALIDITY.
----------------------------------------------
ANY NON-REFUNDABLE AMOUNT FROM A PREVIOUS TICKET
REMAINS NON-REFUNDABLE FOLLOWING A CHANGE.
----------------------------------------------
TICKET IS NOT TRANSFERABLE TO ANOTHER PERSON.
----------------------------------------------
-------CANCELLATION REPRICING CONDITIONS------
FLOWN COUPONS MUST BE REPRICED USING HISTORICAL
FARES IN EFFECT ON THE PREVIOUS TICKETING DATE.
THE FARE FOR THE JOURNEY TRAVELLED MUST BE CAPPED
AT THE TOTAL FARE AMOUNT PLUS CARRIER IMPOSED
CHARGE PAID ON THE TICKET BEING PRESENTED FOR
REFUND.
FULLY FLOWN FARE COMPONENTS MAY BE REPRICED USING
ANY BOOKING CODE WITHIN THE SAME CABIN PROVIDED
THE NEW FARE AMOUNT IS EQUAL OR HIGHER THAN
ORIGINAL.
PARTIALLY FLOWN FARE COMPONENTS MUST BE REPRICED
USING THE SAME OR HIGHER BOOKING CODE.
CHANGES
ANY TIME
CHARGE GBP 60.00 FOR REISSUE/REVALIDATION.
NOTE -
WITH THE EXCEPTION OF TICKETS CHANGED IN THE US
ANY PENALTY FEE MUST BE COLLECTED VIA AN EMD.
REFER TO SPEEDBIRDCLUB.COM OR BATRAVELTRADE.COM
AND YOUR GDS FOR INSTRUCTIONS.
----------------------------------------------
CHARGE APPLIES PER TRANSACTION - PER PERSON FOR
ALL PASSENGER TYPES.
INFANTS WITHOUT A SEAT - NO CHARGE.
--------------------------------------------------
A CHANGE IS A DATE/FLIGHT/ROUTING/BOOKING CODE
CHANGE. NEW RESERVATION AND REISSUE/REVALIDATION
MUST BE MADE ON THE SAME DAY.
--------------------------------------------------
REISSUE MUST BE MADE THE SAME DAY AS CHANGE OF
RESERVATION BUT NO LATER THAN SCHEDULED DEPARTURE
TIME OF FLIGHT BEING CHANGED.
OTHERWISE THE TICKET WILL ONLY BE VALID FOR
REFUND IF APPLICABLE.
--------------------------------------------------
WHEN MORE THAN ONE FARE COMPONENT IS CHANGED THE
HIGHEST PENALTY OF ALL CHANGED FARE COMPONENTS
WITHIN THE JOURNEY APPLIES.
--------------------------------------------------
--- REPRICING CONDITIONS ---
A. BEFORE DEPARTURE OF JOURNEY WHEN THE FIRST
FARE COMPONENT IS CHANGED THE ITINERARY MUST BE
RE-PRICED USING CURRENT FARES IN EFFECT ON THE
DATE THE TICKET IS REISSUED.
B. BEFORE DEPARTURE OF JOURNEY WHEN CHANGES ARE
TO BOOKING CODE ONLY IN THE FIRST FARE COMPONENT
AND RESULT IN A HIGHER FARE THE ITINERARY MUST BE
RE-PRICED USING HISTORICAL FARES IN EFFECT ON THE
PREVIOUS TICKETING DATE OR USING CURRENT FARES IN
EFFECT ON THE DATE THE TICKET IS REISSUED -
WHICHEVER IS LOWER.
C. BEFORE DEPARTURE OF JOURNEY WHEN THERE ARE NO
CHANGES TO THE FIRST FARE COMPONENT BUT OTHER
FARE COMPONENTS ARE CHANGED THE ITINERARY MUST BE
RE-PRICED USING HISTORICAL FARES IN EFFECT ON THE
PREVIOUS TICKETING DATE OR USING CURRENT FARES IN
EFFECT ON THE DATE THE TICKET IS REISSUED-
WHICHEVER IS LOWER.
D. AFTER DEPARTURE OF JOURNEY THE ITINERARY MUST
BE RE-PRICED USING HISTORICAL FARES IN EFFECT ON
THE PREVIOUS TICKETING DATE.
--------------------------------------------------
1. IF SAME BOOKING CLASS IS USED NEW TICKET VALUE
MUST BE LOWER - EQUAL OR HIGHER THAN PREVIOUS AND
MUST COMPLY WITH ALL PROVISIONS OF THE NEW FARE
BEING APPLIED.
2. IF A DIFFERENT BOOKING CLASS IS USED NEW
TICKET VALUE MUST BE EQUAL OR HIGHER THAN
PREVIOUS AND MUST COMPLY WITH ALL PROVISIONS OF
THE NEW FARE BEING APPLIED.
--------------------------------------------------
WHEN THE ITINERARY RESULTS IN A HIGHER FARE THE
DIFFERENCE WILL BE COLLECTED. ANY APPLICABLE
CHANGE FEE STILL APPLIES.
--------------------------------------------------
ANY NON-REFUNDABLE AMOUNT FROM A PREVIOUS TICKET
REMAINS NON-REFUNDABLE FOLLOWING A CHANGE.
--------------------------------------------------
NO-SHOWS FOR A FLIGHT ARE CONSIDERED A
CANCELLATION AFTER DEPARTURE AND CHANGES ARE NOT
PERMITTED.
--------------------------------------------------
TICKET IS NOT TRANSFERABLE TO ANOTHER PERSON.

fareRules.title: Ticket Endorsements END
fareRules.text:
TICKET ENDORSEMENT
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
THE ORIGINAL TICKET MUST BE ANNOTATED - NONREF/-V2R - IN
THE ENDORSEMENT BOX.
NOTE -
TICKETS MUST SHOW BY THE USE OF AN INSERT OR
STICKER THAT TRAVEL IS AT A SPECIAL FARE AND
SUBJECT TO SPECIAL CONDITIONS.

fareRules.title: Children Discounts CHD
fareRules.text:
CHILDREN DISCOUNTS
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED   NOTE - RULE SH19 IN IPRG100
APPLIES
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
ACCOMPANIED CHILD 2-11 - CHARGE 100 PERCENT OF THE FARE.
TICKET DESIGNATOR - CH.
MUST BE ACCOMPANIED ON ALL FLIGHTS BY ADULT 16 OR OLDER
OR - INFANT UNDER 2 WITH A SEAT - CHARGE 100 PERCENT OF
THE FARE.
TICKET DESIGNATOR - CH.
MUST BE ACCOMPANIED ON ALL FLIGHTS BY ADULT 16 OR
OLDER
OR - INFANT UNDER 2 WITHOUT A SEAT - CHARGE 10 PERCENT OF
THE FARE.
TICKET DESIGNATOR - IN.
MUST BE ACCOMPANIED ON ALL FLIGHTS BY ADULT 16 OR
OLDER.

fareRules.title: Tour Conductor Discounts TUC
fareRules.text:
TOUR CONDUCTOR DISCOUNTS
NONE UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED

fareRules.title: Agent Discounts AGT
fareRules.text:
AGENT DISCOUNTS
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED   NOTE - GENERAL RULE DOES NOT
APPLY
AGENT - NO DISCOUNT.

fareRules.title: All Other Discounts DSC
fareRules.text:
ALL OTHER DISCOUNTS
NONE UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED

TOURS
NONE UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED

VOLUNTARY CHANGES
DO A CATEGORY 31 SPECIFIC TEXT ENTRY TO VIEW CONTENTS
ALSO REFERENCE 16 PENALTIES - FOR ADDITIONAL CHANGE INFORMATION

OTHER CONDITIONS

ORIGINATING UNITED KINGDOM -
FOR TICKETING ON/BEFORE 17SEP 18
A SURCHARGE OF GBP 8.00 PER FARE COMPONENT WILL BE
ADDED TO THE APPLICABLE FARE FOR TRAVEL.
ORIGINATING EUROPE -
FOR TICKETING ON/BEFORE 17SEP 18
A SURCHARGE OF EUR 9.50 PER FARE COMPONENT WILL BE
ADDED TO THE APPLICABLE FARE FOR TRAVEL.
ORIGINATING UNITED KINGDOM -
FOR TICKETING ON/AFTER 18SEP 18
A SURCHARGE OF GBP 9.00 PER FARE COMPONENT WILL BE
ADDED TO THE APPLICABLE FARE FOR TRAVEL.
ORIGINATING EUROPE -
FOR TICKETING ON/AFTER 18SEP 18
A SURCHARGE OF EUR 10.50 PER FARE COMPONENT WILL BE

fareRules.title: Sale Restrictions TKT
fareRules.text:
SALES RESTRICTIONS
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
TICKETS MUST BE ISSUED ON BA OR IB.
TICKETS MAY NOT BE ISSUED BY PTA. TICKETS MUST BE ISSUED
BY ELECTRONIC TICKETING. EXTENSION OF TICKET VALIDITY IS
NOT PERMITTED.
OR - TICKETS MUST BE ISSUED ON BA OR AY.
TICKETS MAY NOT BE ISSUED BY PTA. TICKETS MUST BE
ISSUED BY ELECTRONIC TICKETING. EXTENSION OF TICKET
VALIDITY IS NOT PERMITTED.
OR - TICKETS MUST BE ISSUED ON BA OR EI.
TICKETS MAY NOT BE ISSUED BY PTA. TICKETS MUST BE
ISSUED BY ELECTRONIC TICKETING. EXTENSION OF TICKET
VALIDITY IS NOT PERMITTED.
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
TICKETS MAY NOT BE SOLD IN ANGOLA/VENEZUELA/ZIMBABWE/
IRAN,ISLAMIC REPUBLIC OF.
TICKETS MAY ONLY BE SOLD IN AREA 1/AREA 2/AREA 3.

fareRules.title: Penalties CHG
fareRules.text:
PENALTIES
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED   NOTE - RULE 7001 IN IPRG100
APPLIES
FROM/TO UNITED KINGDOM
CANCELLATIONS
ANY TIME
TICKET IS NON-REFUNDABLE.
NOTE -
FARE COMPONENT IS NON-REFUNDABLE.
----------------------------------------------
WAIVED FOR DEATH OF A PASSENGER AND PASSENGERS
TRAVELLING COMPANIONS.
----------------------------------------------
WHEN COMBINING NON-REFUNDABLE FARES WITH
REFUNDABLE FARES
1. THE AMOUNT PAID ON EACH REFUNDABLE FARE
COMPONENT IS REFUNDED.
2. THE AMOUNT PAID ON EACH NON-REFUNDABLE FARE
COMPONENT WILL NOT BE REFUNDED.
3. WHEN COMBINING FARES CHARGE THE SUM OF THE
CANCELLATION FEES OF ALL CANCELLED FARE
COMPONENTS.
----------------------------------------------
REFUND OF UNUSED TAXES FEES AND CHARGES PAID TO
THIRD PARTIES PERMITTED. ASSOCIATED CARRIER
IMPOSED CHARGES WILL NOT BE REFUNDED.
----------------------------------------------
REFUND PERMITTED WITHIN TICKET VALIDITY.
----------------------------------------------
ANY NON-REFUNDABLE AMOUNT FROM A PREVIOUS TICKET
REMAINS NON-REFUNDABLE FOLLOWING A CHANGE.
----------------------------------------------
TICKET IS NOT TRANSFERABLE TO ANOTHER PERSON.
----------------------------------------------
-------CANCELLATION REPRICING CONDITIONS------
FLOWN COUPONS MUST BE REPRICED USING HISTORICAL
FARES IN EFFECT ON THE PREVIOUS TICKETING DATE.
THE FARE FOR THE JOURNEY TRAVELLED MUST BE CAPPED
AT THE TOTAL FARE AMOUNT PLUS CARRIER IMPOSED
CHARGE PAID ON THE TICKET BEING PRESENTED FOR
REFUND.
FULLY FLOWN FARE COMPONENTS MAY BE REPRICED USING
ANY BOOKING CODE WITHIN THE SAME CABIN PROVIDED
THE NEW FARE AMOUNT IS EQUAL OR HIGHER THAN
ORIGINAL.
PARTIALLY FLOWN FARE COMPONENTS MUST BE REPRICED
USING THE SAME OR HIGHER BOOKING CODE.
CHANGES
ANY TIME
CHARGE GBP 60.00 FOR REISSUE/REVALIDATION.
NOTE -
WITH THE EXCEPTION OF TICKETS CHANGED IN THE US
ANY PENALTY FEE MUST BE COLLECTED VIA AN EMD.
REFER TO SPEEDBIRDCLUB.COM OR BATRAVELTRADE.COM
AND YOUR GDS FOR INSTRUCTIONS.
----------------------------------------------
CHARGE APPLIES PER TRANSACTION - PER PERSON FOR
ALL PASSENGER TYPES.
INFANTS WITHOUT A SEAT - NO CHARGE.
--------------------------------------------------
A CHANGE IS A DATE/FLIGHT/ROUTING/BOOKING CODE
CHANGE. NEW RESERVATION AND REISSUE/REVALIDATION
MUST BE MADE ON THE SAME DAY.
--------------------------------------------------
REISSUE MUST BE MADE THE SAME DAY AS CHANGE OF
RESERVATION BUT NO LATER THAN SCHEDULED DEPARTURE
TIME OF FLIGHT BEING CHANGED.
OTHERWISE THE TICKET WILL ONLY BE VALID FOR
REFUND IF APPLICABLE.
--------------------------------------------------
WHEN MORE THAN ONE FARE COMPONENT IS CHANGED THE
HIGHEST PENALTY OF ALL CHANGED FARE COMPONENTS
WITHIN THE JOURNEY APPLIES.
--------------------------------------------------
--- REPRICING CONDITIONS ---
A. BEFORE DEPARTURE OF JOURNEY WHEN THE FIRST
FARE COMPONENT IS CHANGED THE ITINERARY MUST BE
RE-PRICED USING CURRENT FARES IN EFFECT ON THE
DATE THE TICKET IS REISSUED.
B. BEFORE DEPARTURE OF JOURNEY WHEN CHANGES ARE
TO BOOKING CODE ONLY IN THE FIRST FARE COMPONENT
AND RESULT IN A HIGHER FARE THE ITINERARY MUST BE
RE-PRICED USING HISTORICAL FARES IN EFFECT ON THE
PREVIOUS TICKETING DATE OR USING CURRENT FARES IN
EFFECT ON THE DATE THE TICKET IS REISSUED -
WHICHEVER IS LOWER.
C. BEFORE DEPARTURE OF JOURNEY WHEN THERE ARE NO
CHANGES TO THE FIRST FARE COMPONENT BUT OTHER
FARE COMPONENTS ARE CHANGED THE ITINERARY MUST BE
RE-PRICED USING HISTORICAL FARES IN EFFECT ON THE
PREVIOUS TICKETING DATE OR USING CURRENT FARES IN
EFFECT ON THE DATE THE TICKET IS REISSUED-
WHICHEVER IS LOWER.
D. AFTER DEPARTURE OF JOURNEY THE ITINERARY MUST
BE RE-PRICED USING HISTORICAL FARES IN EFFECT ON
THE PREVIOUS TICKETING DATE.
--------------------------------------------------
1. IF SAME BOOKING CLASS IS USED NEW TICKET VALUE
MUST BE LOWER - EQUAL OR HIGHER THAN PREVIOUS AND
MUST COMPLY WITH ALL PROVISIONS OF THE NEW FARE
BEING APPLIED.
2. IF A DIFFERENT BOOKING CLASS IS USED NEW
TICKET VALUE MUST BE EQUAL OR HIGHER THAN
PREVIOUS AND MUST COMPLY WITH ALL PROVISIONS OF
THE NEW FARE BEING APPLIED.
--------------------------------------------------
WHEN THE ITINERARY RESULTS IN A HIGHER FARE THE
DIFFERENCE WILL BE COLLECTED. ANY APPLICABLE
CHANGE FEE STILL APPLIES.
--------------------------------------------------
ANY NON-REFUNDABLE AMOUNT FROM A PREVIOUS TICKET
REMAINS NON-REFUNDABLE FOLLOWING A CHANGE.
--------------------------------------------------
NO-SHOWS FOR A FLIGHT ARE CONSIDERED A
CANCELLATION AFTER DEPARTURE AND CHANGES ARE NOT
PERMITTED.
--------------------------------------------------
TICKET IS NOT TRANSFERABLE TO ANOTHER PERSON.

fareRules.title: Ticket Endorsements END
fareRules.text:
TICKET ENDORSEMENT
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
THE ORIGINAL TICKET MUST BE ANNOTATED - NONREF/-V2R - IN
THE ENDORSEMENT BOX.
NOTE -
TICKETS MUST SHOW BY THE USE OF AN INSERT OR
STICKER THAT TRAVEL IS AT A SPECIAL FARE AND
SUBJECT TO SPECIAL CONDITIONS.

fareRules.title: Children Discounts CHD
fareRules.text:
CHILDREN DISCOUNTS
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED   NOTE - RULE SH19 IN IPRG100
APPLIES
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
ACCOMPANIED CHILD 2-11 - CHARGE 100 PERCENT OF THE FARE.
TICKET DESIGNATOR - CH.
MUST BE ACCOMPANIED ON ALL FLIGHTS BY ADULT 16 OR OLDER
OR - INFANT UNDER 2 WITH A SEAT - CHARGE 100 PERCENT OF
THE FARE.
TICKET DESIGNATOR - CH.
MUST BE ACCOMPANIED ON ALL FLIGHTS BY ADULT 16 OR
OLDER
OR - INFANT UNDER 2 WITHOUT A SEAT - CHARGE 10 PERCENT OF
THE FARE.
TICKET DESIGNATOR - IN.
MUST BE ACCOMPANIED ON ALL FLIGHTS BY ADULT 16 OR
OLDER.

fareRules.title: Tour Conductor Discounts TUC
fareRules.text:
TOUR CONDUCTOR DISCOUNTS
NONE UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED

fareRules.title: Agent Discounts AGT
fareRules.text:
AGENT DISCOUNTS
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED   NOTE - GENERAL RULE DOES NOT
APPLY
AGENT - NO DISCOUNT.

fareRules.title: All Other Discounts DSC
fareRules.text:
ALL OTHER DISCOUNTS
NONE UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED

TOURS
NONE UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED

VOLUNTARY CHANGES
DO A CATEGORY 31 SPECIFIC TEXT ENTRY TO VIEW CONTENTS
ALSO REFERENCE 16 PENALTIES - FOR ADDITIONAL CHANGE INFORMATION

fareRules.title: Application and Other Conditions APP
fareRules.text:
APPLICATION AND OTHER CONDITIONS
RULE - 021/M525
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
BRITISH AIRWAYS ECONOMY STANDARD FARE BETWEEN UNITED KINGDOM
AND EUROPE
APPLICATION
AREA
THESE FARES APPLY
BETWEEN UNITED KINGDOM AND EUROPE.
CLASS OF SERVICE
THESE FARES APPLY FOR ECONOMY CLASS SERVICE.
TYPES OF TRANSPORTATION
THIS RULE GOVERNS ONE-WAY AND ROUND-TRIP FARES.
FARES GOVERNED BY THIS RULE CAN BE USED TO CREATE
ONE-WAY/ROUND-TRIP/OPEN-JAW JOURNEYS.
FARES ONLY APPLY IF PURCHASED BEFORE DEPARTURE.
EXCEPTION
MAY BE USED FOR EN-ROUTE UPGRADING FROM A LOWER
FARE PROVIDED ALL CONDITIONS OF THSES FARES ARE
MET.WHEN COMBINING ON A HALF ROUNDTRIP BASIS THE
FARE RULES FOR EACH SECTOR BOOKED APPLY.
CAPACITY LIMITATIONS
THE CARRIER SHALL LIMIT THE NUMBER OF PASSENGERS CARRIED
ON ANY ONE FLIGHT AT FARES GOVERNED BY THIS RULE AND SUCH
FARES WILL NOT NECESSARILY BE AVAILABLE ON ALL FLIGHTS.
THE NUMBER OF SEATS WHICH THE CARRIER SHALL MAKE
AVAILABLE ON A GIVEN FLIGHT WILL BE DETERMINED BY THE
CARRIERS BEST JUDGMENT
OTHER CONDITIONS
FARES GOVERNED BY THIS RULE MAY BELONG TO BRITISH
AIRWAYS STANDARD FARE FAMILY FOR ELIGIBLE POINT-
TO-POINT JOURNEYS. CONTACT BRITISH AIRWAYS FOR
DETAILS.

fareRules.title: Seasonality SEA
fareRules.text:
SEASONALITY
FOR -L TYPE FARES
PERMITTED 01SEP THROUGH 30JUN ON THE FIRST INTERNATIONAL
SECTOR.

fareRules.text:

ANY BA FLIGHT
ANY IB FLIGHT
ANY TP FLIGHT.

fareRules.title: Advance Reservations/Ticketing ADV
fareRules.text:
ADVANCE RES/TICKETING
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
RESERVATIONS FOR ALL SECTORS ARE REQUIRED AT LEAST 30 DAYS
BEFORE DEPARTURE.
TICKETING MUST BE COMPLETED WITHIN 3 DAYS AFTER
RESERVATIONS ARE MADE OR AT LEAST 30 DAYS BEFORE DEPARTURE
WHICHEVER IS EARLIER.

fareRules.title: Minimum Stay MIN 7 Maximum Stay MAX
fareRules.text:
MINIMUM STAY
NONE UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED

MAXIMUM STAY
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED   NOTE - GENERAL RULE DOES NOT
APPLY
TRAVEL FROM LAST STOPOVER MUST COMMENCE NO LATER THAN 12
MONTHS AFTER DEPARTURE FROM FARE ORIGIN.

fareRules.title: Stopovers STP
fareRules.text:
STOPOVERS
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED   NOTE - GENERAL RULE DOES NOT
APPLY
STOPOVERS NOT PERMITTED ON THE FARE COMPONENT.

fareRules.title: Transfers TRF
fareRules.text:
TRANSFERS
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED   NOTE - GENERAL RULE DOES NOT
APPLY
UNLIMITED TRANSFERS PERMITTED ON THE PRICING UNIT
FARE BREAK AND EMBEDDED SURFACE SECTORS PERMITTED ON THE
FARE COMPONENT.
NOTE -
TRANSFERS PERMITTED - SEE ROUTING ON FARES.

fareRules.title: Permitted Combinations CMB
fareRules.text:
PERMITTED COMBINATIONS
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
APPLICABLE ADD-ON CONSTRUCTION IS ADDRESSED IN
MISCELLANEOUS PROVISIONS - CATEGORY 23.
OPEN JAWS/ROUND TRIPS/CIRCLE TRIPS/END-ON-END
FARES MAY BE COMBINED ON A HALF ROUND TRIP BASIS
-TO FORM SINGLE OR DOUBLE OPEN JAWS/ROUND TRIPS/CIRCLE
TRIPS.
END-ON-END COMBINATIONS PERMITTED. VALIDATE ALL FARE
COMPONENTS. SIDE TRIPS NOT PERMITTED.
PROVIDED -
COMBINATIONS ARE WITH ANY FARE FOR CARRIER BA BETWEEN
UNITED KINGDOM/LIBYAN ARAB JAMAHIRIYA
OR FOR CARRIER BA/IB/VY/EI WITHIN EUROPE IN ANY RULE IN
ANY TARIFF
THE FARE COMPONENT MUST BE ON
ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING
ANY IB FLIGHT OPERATED BY IB
ANY IB FLIGHT OPERATED BY BA
ANY IB FLIGHT OPERATED BY VY
ANY IB FLIGHT OPERATED BY EI
ANY EI FLIGHT OPERATED BY EI
ANY EI FLIGHT OPERATED BY BA
ANY EI FLIGHT OPERATED BY IB
ANY BA FLIGHT
ANY VY FLIGHT.

fareRules.title: Surcharges SUR
fareRules.text:
SURCHARGES
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED   NOTE - GENERAL RULE DOES NOT
APPLY
IF UNACCOMPANIED CHILD 5-11.
A SURCHARGE OF USD 125.00 PER DIRECTION WILL BE ADDED TO
THE APPLICABLE FARE FOR TRAVEL.

fareRules.title: Sale Restrictions TKT
fareRules.text:
SALES RESTRICTIONS
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED   NOTE - GENERAL RULE DOES NOT
APPLY
TICKETS MUST BE ISSUED ON BA OR IB.
TICKETS MAY NOT BE ISSUED BY PTA. TICKETS MUST BE ISSUED
BY ELECTRONIC TICKETING. EXTENSION OF TICKET VALIDITY IS
NOT PERMITTED.
NOTE -
PRIME ISSUE PERMITTED ONLY ON BA/IB DOCUMENTS BUT
REISSUE FOR PURPOSE OF SERVICING THIS FARE IS
PERMITTED ON ANY ONEWORLD ALLIANCE CARRIER TICKET

fareRules.title: Penalties CHG
fareRules.text:
PENALTIES
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED   NOTE - RULE M500 IN IPRG100
APPLIES
BETWEEN SPAIN AND CANARY ISLANDS AND UNITED KINGDOM FOR O- TYPE
FARES
ORIGINATING UNITED KINGDOM -
CANCELLATIONS
ANY TIME
TICKET IS NON-REFUNDABLE IN CASE OF CANCEL/NO-SHOW.
NOTE -
FARE COMPONENT IS NON-REFUNDABLE
---------------------------------
WAIVED FOR DEATH OF A PASSENGER AND PASSENGER-S
TRAVELLING COMPANIONS.
----------------------------------
WHEN COMBINING NON-REFUNDABLE FARES WITH A
REFUNDABLE FARES
1- THE AMOUNT PAID ON EACH REFUNDABLE FARE
COMPONENT IS REFUNDED
2- THE AMOUNT PAID ON EACH NON-REFUNDABLE FARE
COMPONENT WILL NOT BE REFUNDED.
3- WHEN COMBINING FARES CHARGE THE SUM OF THE
CANCELLATION FEES OF ALL CANCELLED FARE COMPONENTS
----------------------------------
REFUND OF UNUSED TAXES FEES AND CHARGES PAID TO
THIRD PARTIES PERMITTED. ASSOCIATED CARRIER
IMPOSED CHARGES WILL NOT BE REFUNDED.
----------------------------------
REFUND PERMITTED WITHIN TICKET VALIDITY.
----------------------------------
ANY NON-REFUNDABLE AMOUNT FROM A PREVIOUS TICKET
REMAINS NON-REFUNDABLE FOLLOWING A CHANGE.
----------------------------------
TICKET IS NOT TRANSFERABLE TO ANOTHER PERSON.
----------------------------------
FOR NON REFUNDABLE FARES THE YQ/YR CARRIER
IMPOSED SURCHARGE WILL NOT BE REFUNDED
CHANGES
ANY TIME
CHARGE GBP 60.00 FOR REISSUE.
NOTE -
/CHARGE APPLIES PER TRANSACTION - PER PERSON TO
ALL PASSENGER TYPES.
------------------------------
NO-SHOWS FOR A FLIGHT ARE CONSIDERED A
CANCELLATION AFTER DEPARTURE AND CHANGES ARE NOT
PERMITTED.
-----------------------------
----REPRICING CONDITIONS ----
A. BEFORE DEPARTURE OF JOURNEY WHEN THE FISRT
FARE COMPONENT IS CHANGED THE ITINERARY MUST BE
RE-PRICED USING CURRENT FARES IN EFFECT ON THE
DATE THE TICKET IS REISSUED.
B.BEFORE DEPARTURE OF JOURNEY WHEN CHANGES ARE TO
BOOKING CODE ONLY IN THE FIRST FARE COMPONENT AND
RESULT IN A HIGHER FARE THE ITINERARY MUST BE RE-
PRICED USING HISTORICAL FARES IN EFFECT ON THE
PREVIOUS TICKETING DATE OR USING CURRENT FARE IN
EFFECT ON THE DATE THE TICKET IS REISSUED -
WICHEVER IS LOWER.
C. BEFORE DEPARTURE OF JOURNEY WHEN THERE ARE NO
CHANGES TO THE FIRST FARE COMPONENT BUT OTHER
FARE COMPONENTS ARE CHANGED THE ITINERARY MUST BE
RE-PRICED USING HISTORICAL FAERS IN EFFECT ON THE
PREVIOUS TICKETING DATE OR USING CURRENT FARES IN
EFFECT ON THE DATE THE TICKET IS REISSUED -
WHICHEVER IS LOWER.
D. AFTER DEPARTURE OF JOURNEY THE ITINERARY MUST
BE RE-PRICED USING HISTORICAL FARES IN EFFECT ON
THE PREVIOUS TICKETING DATE.
-----------------------------------------------
NEW TICKET MAY BE EQUAL OR HIGHER THAN PREVIOUS
AND MUST COMPLY WITH ALL PROVISIONS OF THE NEW
FARE BEING APPLIED.
-----------------------------------------------
WHEN THE ITINERARY RESULT IN A HIGHER FARE THE
DIFFERENCE WILL BE COLLECTED. ANY APPLICABLE
CHANGE FEE STILL APPLIES.
-----------------------------------------------
WHEN THE NEW ITINERARY RESULTS IN A LOWER FARE
THE CHANGE FEE APPLIES AND NO CREDIT OF THE
RESIDUAL AMOUNT WILL BE MADE.
-----------------------------------------------
NO-SHOW FOR A FLIGHT ARE CONSIDERED A
CANCELLATION AFTER DEPARTURE AND CHANGES ARE NOT
PERMITTED.
-----------------------------------------------
TICKET IS NOT TRANSFEREABLE TO ANOTHER PERSON
ORIGINATING SPAIN AND CANARY ISLANDS -
CANCELLATIONS
ANY TIME
TICKET IS NON-REFUNDABLE IN CASE OF CANCEL/NO-SHOW.
NOTE -
FARE COMPONENT IS NON-REFUNDABLE
---------------------------------
WAIVED FOR DEATH OF A PASSENGER AND PASSENGER-S
TRAVELLING COMPANIONS.
----------------------------------
WHEN COMBINING NON-REFUNDABLE FARES WITH A
REFUNDABLE FARES
1- THE AMOUNT PAID ON EACH REFUNDABLE FARE
COMPONENT IS REFUNDED
2- THE AMOUNT PAID ON EACH NON-REFUNDABLE FARE
COMPONENT WILL NOT BE REFUNDED.
3- WHEN COMBINING FARES CHARGE THE SUM OF THE
CANCELLATION FEES OF ALL CANCELLED FARE COMPONENTS
----------------------------------
REFUND OF UNUSED TAXES FEES AND CHARGES PAID TO
THIRD PARTIES PERMITTED. ASSOCIATED CARRIER
IMPOSED CHARGES WILL NOT BE REFUNDED.
----------------------------------
REFUND PERMITTED WITHIN TICKET VALIDITY.
----------------------------------
ANY NON-REFUNDABLE AMOUNT FROM A PREVIOUS TICKET
REMAINS NON-REFUNDABLE FOLLOWING A CHANGE.
----------------------------------
TICKET IS NOT TRANSFERABLE TO ANOTHER PERSON.
----------------------------------
FOR NON REFUNDABLE FARES THE YQ/YR CARRIER
IMPOSED SURCHARGE WILL NOT BE REFUNDED
CHANGES
ANY TIME
CHARGE EUR 45.00 FOR REISSUE.
CHILD/INFANT DISCOUNTS APPLY.
NOTE -
/CHARGE APPLIES PER TRANSACTION - PER PERSON TO
ALL PASSENGER TYPES.
------------------------------
NO-SHOWS FOR A FLIGHT ARE CONSIDERED A
CANCELLATION AFTER DEPARTURE AND CHANGES ARE NOT
PERMITTED.
-----------------------------
----REPRICING CONDITIONS ----
A. BEFORE DEPARTURE OF JOURNEY WHEN THE FISRT
FARE COMPONENT IS CHANGED THE ITINERARY MUST BE
RE-PRICED USING CURRENT FARES IN EFFECT ON THE
DATE THE TICKET IS REISSUED.
B.BEFORE DEPARTURE OF JOURNEY WHEN CHANGES ARE TO
BOOKING CODE ONLY IN THE FIRST FARE COMPONENT AND
RESULT IN A HIGHER FARE THE ITINERARY MUST BE RE-
PRICED USING HISTORICAL FARES IN EFFECT ON THE
PREVIOUS TICKETING DATE OR USING CURRENT FARE IN
EFFECT ON THE DATE THE TICKET IS REISSUED -
WICHEVER IS LOWER.
C. BEFORE DEPARTURE OF JOURNEY WHEN THERE ARE NO
CHANGES TO THE FIRST FARE COMPONENT BUT OTHER
FARE COMPONENTS ARE CHANGED THE ITINERARY MUST BE
RE-PRICED USING HISTORICAL FAERS IN EFFECT ON THE
PREVIOUS TICKETING DATE OR USING CURRENT FARES IN
EFFECT ON THE DATE THE TICKET IS REISSUED -
WHICHEVER IS LOWER.
D. AFTER DEPARTURE OF JOURNEY THE ITINERARY MUST
BE RE-PRICED USING HISTORICAL FARES IN EFFECT ON
THE PREVIOUS TICKETING DATE.
-----------------------------------------------
NEW TICKET MAY BE EQUAL OR HIGHER THAN PREVIOUS
AND MUST COMPLY WITH ALL PROVISIONS OF THE NEW
FARE BEING APPLIED.
-----------------------------------------------
WHEN THE ITINERARY RESULT IN A HIGHER FARE THE
DIFFERENCE WILL BE COLLECTED. ANY APPLICABLE
CHANGE FEE STILL APPLIES.
-----------------------------------------------
WHEN THE NEW ITINERARY RESULTS IN A LOWER FARE
THE CHANGE FEE APPLIES AND NO CREDIT OF THE
RESIDUAL AMOUNT WILL BE MADE.
-----------------------------------------------
NO-SHOW FOR A FLIGHT ARE CONSIDERED A
CANCELLATION AFTER DEPARTURE AND CHANGES ARE NOT
PERMITTED.
-----------------------------------------------
TICKET IS NOT TRANSFEREABLE TO ANOTHER PERSON

fareRules.title: Ticket Endorsements END
fareRules.text:
TICKET ENDORSEMENT
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED   NOTE - RULE M500 IN IPRG100
APPLIES
WITHIN EUROPE FOR O- TYPE FARES
THE ORIGINAL AND THE REISSUED TICKET MUST BE ANNOTATED -
21 NOEND/CHG RST/REF NOPER - IN THE ENDORSEMENT BOX.
AND - THE ORIGINAL AND THE REISSUED TICKET MUST BE
ANNOTATED - RESTRICTIONS APPLY - IN THE FORM OF
PAYMENT BOX.

fareRules.title: Children Discounts CHD
fareRules.text:
CHILDREN DISCOUNTS
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED   NOTE - GENERAL RULE DOES NOT
APPLY
ACCOMPANIED CHILD 2-11 - CHARGE 100 PERCENT OF THE FARE.
TICKETING CODE - BASE FARE CODE PLUS CH.
MUST BE ACCOMPANIED ON ALL FLIGHTS IN SAME COMPARTMENT
AT THIS RULE BY ADULT 12 OR OLDER
OR - UNACCOMPANIED CHILD 5-11 - CHARGE 100 PERCENT OF THE
FARE.
TICKETING CODE - BASE FARE CODE PLUS CH
OR - INFANT UNDER 2 WITH A SEAT - CHARGE 100 PERCENT OF
THE FARE.
TICKETING CODE - BASE FARE CODE PLUS IN.
MUST BE ACCOMPANIED ON ALL FLIGHTS IN SAME
COMPARTMENT AT THIS RULE BY ADULT 12 OR OLDER
OR - INFANT UNDER 2 WITHOUT A SEAT - CHARGE 10 PERCENT OF
THE FARE.
TICKETING CODE - BASE FARE CODE PLUS IN.
MUST BE ACCOMPANIED ON ALL FLIGHTS IN SAME
COMPARTMENT AT THIS RULE BY ADULT 12 OR OLDER.

fareRules.title: Tour Conductor Discounts TUC
fareRules.text:
TOUR CONDUCTOR DISCOUNTS
NONE UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED

fareRules.title: Agent Discounts AGT
fareRules.text:
AGENT DISCOUNTS
NONE UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED

fareRules.title: All Other Discounts DSC
fareRules.text:
ALL OTHER DISCOUNTS
NONE UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED

TOURS
NONE UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED

VOLUNTARY CHANGES
DO A CATEGORY 31 SPECIFIC TEXT ENTRY TO VIEW CONTENTS
ALSO REFERENCE 16 PENALTIES - FOR ADDITIONAL CHANGE INFORMATION

fareRules.title: Application and Other Conditions APP
fareRules.text:
APPLICATION AND OTHER CONDITIONS
RULE - 021/M525
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
BRITISH AIRWAYS ECONOMY STANDARD FARE BETWEEN UNITED KINGDOM
AND EUROPE
APPLICATION
AREA
THESE FARES APPLY
BETWEEN UNITED KINGDOM AND EUROPE.
CLASS OF SERVICE
THESE FARES APPLY FOR ECONOMY CLASS SERVICE.
TYPES OF TRANSPORTATION
THIS RULE GOVERNS ONE-WAY AND ROUND-TRIP FARES.
FARES GOVERNED BY THIS RULE CAN BE USED TO CREATE
ONE-WAY/ROUND-TRIP/OPEN-JAW JOURNEYS.
FARES ONLY APPLY IF PURCHASED BEFORE DEPARTURE.
EXCEPTION
MAY BE USED FOR EN-ROUTE UPGRADING FROM A LOWER
FARE PROVIDED ALL CONDITIONS OF THSES FARES ARE
MET.WHEN COMBINING ON A HALF ROUNDTRIP BASIS THE
FARE RULES FOR EACH SECTOR BOOKED APPLY.
CAPACITY LIMITATIONS
THE CARRIER SHALL LIMIT THE NUMBER OF PASSENGERS CARRIED
ON ANY ONE FLIGHT AT FARES GOVERNED BY THIS RULE AND SUCH
FARES WILL NOT NECESSARILY BE AVAILABLE ON ALL FLIGHTS.
THE NUMBER OF SEATS WHICH THE CARRIER SHALL MAKE
AVAILABLE ON A GIVEN FLIGHT WILL BE DETERMINED BY THE
CARRIERS BEST JUDGMENT
OTHER CONDITIONS
FARES GOVERNED BY THIS RULE MAY BELONG TO BRITISH
AIRWAYS STANDARD FARE FAMILY FOR ELIGIBLE POINT-
TO-POINT JOURNEYS. CONTACT BRITISH AIRWAYS FOR
DETAILS.

fareRules.title: Seasonality SEA
fareRules.text:
SEASONALITY
FOR -L TYPE FARES
PERMITTED 01SEP THROUGH 30JUN ON THE FIRST INTERNATIONAL
SECTOR.

fareRules.title: Flight Application FLT
fareRules.text:
FLIGHT APPLICATION
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED   NOTE - GENERAL RULE DOES NOT
APPLY
THE FARE COMPONENT MUST NOT BE ON
ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING
BA FLIGHTS 2046 THROUGH 2060.
AND
THE FARE COMPONENT MUST NOT BE ON
ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING
BA FLIGHTS 2190 THROUGH 2765.
AND
THE FARE COMPONENT MUST NOT BE ON
ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING
BA FLIGHTS 2779 THROUGH 2799.
AND
THE FARE COMPONENT MUST NOT BE ON
ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING
BA FLIGHTS 3270 THROUGH 3299.
AND
THE FARE COMPONENT MUST NOT BE ON
ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING
BA FLIGHTS 4450 THROUGH 4471.
AND
THE FARE COMPONENT MUST NOT BE ON
ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING
BA FLIGHTS 7276 THROUGH 7277.
AND
THE FARE COMPONENT MUST NOT BE ON
ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING
BA FLIGHTS 7278 THROUGH 7279.
AND
THE FARE COMPONENT MUST NOT BE ON
ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING
BA FLIGHTS 7287 THROUGH 7289.
AND
THE FARE COMPONENT MUST NOT BE ON
ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING
BA FLIGHTS 7280 THROUGH 7285.
AND
THE FARE COMPONENT MUST NOT BE ON
ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING
BA FLIGHTS 7290 THROUGH 7291.
AND
THE FARE COMPONENT MUST NOT BE ON
ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING
BA FLIGHTS 7292 THROUGH 7293.
AND
THE FARE COMPONENT MUST NOT BE ON
ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING
BA FLIGHTS 8040 THROUGH 8199.
AND
THE FARE COMPONENT MUST NOT BE ON
ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING
BA FLIGHTS 8450 THROUGH 8497.
AND
THE FARE COMPONENT MUST NOT BE ON
ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING
BA FLIGHTS 8700 THROUGH 8769.
AND
THE FARE COMPONENT MUST NOT BE ON
ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING
BA FLIGHTS 8830 THROUGH 8849.
AND
THE FARE COMPONENT MUST BE ON
ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING
ANY BA FLIGHT
ANY IB FLIGHT
ANY TP FLIGHT.

fareRules.title: Advance Reservations/Ticketing ADV
fareRules.text:
ADVANCE RES/TICKETING
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
RESERVATIONS FOR ALL SECTORS ARE REQUIRED AT LEAST 30 DAYS
BEFORE DEPARTURE.
TICKETING MUST BE COMPLETED WITHIN 3 DAYS AFTER
RESERVATIONS ARE MADE OR AT LEAST 30 DAYS BEFORE DEPARTURE
WHICHEVER IS EARLIER.

fareRules.title: Minimum Stay MIN 7 Maximum Stay MAX
fareRules.text:
MINIMUM STAY
NONE UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED

MAXIMUM STAY
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED   NOTE - GENERAL RULE DOES NOT
APPLY
TRAVEL FROM LAST STOPOVER MUST COMMENCE NO LATER THAN 12
MONTHS AFTER DEPARTURE FROM FARE ORIGIN.

fareRules.title: Stopovers STP
fareRules.text:
STOPOVERS
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED   NOTE - GENERAL RULE DOES NOT
APPLY
STOPOVERS NOT PERMITTED ON THE FARE COMPONENT.

fareRules.title: Transfers TRF
fareRules.text:
TRANSFERS
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED   NOTE - GENERAL RULE DOES NOT
APPLY
UNLIMITED TRANSFERS PERMITTED ON THE PRICING UNIT
FARE BREAK AND EMBEDDED SURFACE SECTORS PERMITTED ON THE
FARE COMPONENT.
NOTE -
TRANSFERS PERMITTED - SEE ROUTING ON FARES.

fareRules.title: Permitted Combinations CMB
fareRules.text:
PERMITTED COMBINATIONS
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED
APPLICABLE ADD-ON CONSTRUCTION IS ADDRESSED IN
MISCELLANEOUS PROVISIONS - CATEGORY 23.
OPEN JAWS/ROUND TRIPS/CIRCLE TRIPS/END-ON-END
FARES MAY BE COMBINED ON A HALF ROUND TRIP BASIS
-TO FORM SINGLE OR DOUBLE OPEN JAWS/ROUND TRIPS/CIRCLE
TRIPS.
END-ON-END COMBINATIONS PERMITTED. VALIDATE ALL FARE
COMPONENTS. SIDE TRIPS NOT PERMITTED.
PROVIDED -
COMBINATIONS ARE WITH ANY FARE FOR CARRIER BA BETWEEN
UNITED KINGDOM/LIBYAN ARAB JAMAHIRIYA
OR FOR CARRIER BA/IB/VY/EI WITHIN EUROPE IN ANY RULE IN
ANY TARIFF
THE FARE COMPONENT MUST BE ON
ONE OR MORE OF THE FOLLOWING
ANY IB FLIGHT OPERATED BY IB
ANY IB FLIGHT OPERATED BY BA
ANY IB FLIGHT OPERATED BY VY
ANY IB FLIGHT OPERATED BY EI
ANY EI FLIGHT OPERATED BY EI
ANY EI FLIGHT OPERATED BY BA
ANY EI FLIGHT OPERATED BY IB
ANY BA FLIGHT
ANY VY FLIGHT.

fareRules.title: Surcharges SUR
fareRules.text:
SURCHARGES
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED   NOTE - GENERAL RULE DOES NOT
APPLY
IF UNACCOMPANIED CHILD 5-11.
A SURCHARGE OF USD 125.00 PER DIRECTION WILL BE ADDED TO
THE APPLICABLE FARE FOR TRAVEL.

fareRules.title: Sale Restrictions TKT
fareRules.text:
SALES RESTRICTIONS
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED   NOTE - GENERAL RULE DOES NOT
APPLY
TICKETS MUST BE ISSUED ON BA OR IB.
TICKETS MAY NOT BE ISSUED BY PTA. TICKETS MUST BE ISSUED
BY ELECTRONIC TICKETING. EXTENSION OF TICKET VALIDITY IS
NOT PERMITTED.
NOTE -
PRIME ISSUE PERMITTED ONLY ON BA/IB DOCUMENTS BUT
REISSUE FOR PURPOSE OF SERVICING THIS FARE IS
PERMITTED ON ANY ONEWORLD ALLIANCE CARRIER TICKET

fareRules.title: Penalties CHG
fareRules.text:
PENALTIES
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED   NOTE - RULE M500 IN IPRG100
APPLIES
BETWEEN SPAIN AND CANARY ISLANDS AND UNITED KINGDOM FOR O- TYPE
FARES
ORIGINATING UNITED KINGDOM -
CANCELLATIONS
ANY TIME
TICKET IS NON-REFUNDABLE IN CASE OF CANCEL/NO-SHOW.
NOTE -
FARE COMPONENT IS NON-REFUNDABLE
---------------------------------
WAIVED FOR DEATH OF A PASSENGER AND PASSENGER-S
TRAVELLING COMPANIONS.
----------------------------------
WHEN COMBINING NON-REFUNDABLE FARES WITH A
REFUNDABLE FARES
1- THE AMOUNT PAID ON EACH REFUNDABLE FARE
COMPONENT IS REFUNDED
2- THE AMOUNT PAID ON EACH NON-REFUNDABLE FARE
COMPONENT WILL NOT BE REFUNDED.
3- WHEN COMBINING FARES CHARGE THE SUM OF THE
CANCELLATION FEES OF ALL CANCELLED FARE COMPONENTS
----------------------------------
REFUND OF UNUSED TAXES FEES AND CHARGES PAID TO
THIRD PARTIES PERMITTED. ASSOCIATED CARRIER
IMPOSED CHARGES WILL NOT BE REFUNDED.
----------------------------------
REFUND PERMITTED WITHIN TICKET VALIDITY.
----------------------------------
ANY NON-REFUNDABLE AMOUNT FROM A PREVIOUS TICKET
REMAINS NON-REFUNDABLE FOLLOWING A CHANGE.
----------------------------------
TICKET IS NOT TRANSFERABLE TO ANOTHER PERSON.
----------------------------------
FOR NON REFUNDABLE FARES THE YQ/YR CARRIER
IMPOSED SURCHARGE WILL NOT BE REFUNDED
CHANGES
ANY TIME
CHARGE GBP 60.00 FOR REISSUE.
NOTE -
/CHARGE APPLIES PER TRANSACTION - PER PERSON TO
ALL PASSENGER TYPES.
------------------------------
NO-SHOWS FOR A FLIGHT ARE CONSIDERED A
CANCELLATION AFTER DEPARTURE AND CHANGES ARE NOT
PERMITTED.
-----------------------------
----REPRICING CONDITIONS ----
A. BEFORE DEPARTURE OF JOURNEY WHEN THE FISRT
FARE COMPONENT IS CHANGED THE ITINERARY MUST BE
RE-PRICED USING CURRENT FARES IN EFFECT ON THE
DATE THE TICKET IS REISSUED.
B.BEFORE DEPARTURE OF JOURNEY WHEN CHANGES ARE TO
BOOKING CODE ONLY IN THE FIRST FARE COMPONENT AND
RESULT IN A HIGHER FARE THE ITINERARY MUST BE RE-
PRICED USING HISTORICAL FARES IN EFFECT ON THE
PREVIOUS TICKETING DATE OR USING CURRENT FARE IN
EFFECT ON THE DATE THE TICKET IS REISSUED -
WICHEVER IS LOWER.
C. BEFORE DEPARTURE OF JOURNEY WHEN THERE ARE NO
CHANGES TO THE FIRST FARE COMPONENT BUT OTHER
FARE COMPONENTS ARE CHANGED THE ITINERARY MUST BE
RE-PRICED USING HISTORICAL FAERS IN EFFECT ON THE
PREVIOUS TICKETING DATE OR USING CURRENT FARES IN
EFFECT ON THE DATE THE TICKET IS REISSUED -
WHICHEVER IS LOWER.
D. AFTER DEPARTURE OF JOURNEY THE ITINERARY MUST
BE RE-PRICED USING HISTORICAL FARES IN EFFECT ON
THE PREVIOUS TICKETING DATE.
-----------------------------------------------
NEW TICKET MAY BE EQUAL OR HIGHER THAN PREVIOUS
AND MUST COMPLY WITH ALL PROVISIONS OF THE NEW
FARE BEING APPLIED.
-----------------------------------------------
WHEN THE ITINERARY RESULT IN A HIGHER FARE THE
DIFFERENCE WILL BE COLLECTED. ANY APPLICABLE
CHANGE FEE STILL APPLIES.
-----------------------------------------------
WHEN THE NEW ITINERARY RESULTS IN A LOWER FARE
THE CHANGE FEE APPLIES AND NO CREDIT OF THE
RESIDUAL AMOUNT WILL BE MADE.
-----------------------------------------------
NO-SHOW FOR A FLIGHT ARE CONSIDERED A
CANCELLATION AFTER DEPARTURE AND CHANGES ARE NOT
PERMITTED.
-----------------------------------------------
TICKET IS NOT TRANSFEREABLE TO ANOTHER PERSON
ORIGINATING SPAIN AND CANARY ISLANDS -
CANCELLATIONS
ANY TIME
TICKET IS NON-REFUNDABLE IN CASE OF CANCEL/NO-SHOW.
NOTE -
FARE COMPONENT IS NON-REFUNDABLE
---------------------------------
WAIVED FOR DEATH OF A PASSENGER AND PASSENGER-S
TRAVELLING COMPANIONS.
----------------------------------
WHEN COMBINING NON-REFUNDABLE FARES WITH A
REFUNDABLE FARES
1- THE AMOUNT PAID ON EACH REFUNDABLE FARE
COMPONENT IS REFUNDED
2- THE AMOUNT PAID ON EACH NON-REFUNDABLE FARE
COMPONENT WILL NOT BE REFUNDED.
3- WHEN COMBINING FARES CHARGE THE SUM OF THE
CANCELLATION FEES OF ALL CANCELLED FARE COMPONENTS
----------------------------------
REFUND OF UNUSED TAXES FEES AND CHARGES PAID TO
THIRD PARTIES PERMITTED. ASSOCIATED CARRIER
IMPOSED CHARGES WILL NOT BE REFUNDED.
----------------------------------
REFUND PERMITTED WITHIN TICKET VALIDITY.
----------------------------------
ANY NON-REFUNDABLE AMOUNT FROM A PREVIOUS TICKET
REMAINS NON-REFUNDABLE FOLLOWING A CHANGE.
----------------------------------
TICKET IS NOT TRANSFERABLE TO ANOTHER PERSON.
----------------------------------
FOR NON REFUNDABLE FARES THE YQ/YR CARRIER
IMPOSED SURCHARGE WILL NOT BE REFUNDED
CHANGES
ANY TIME
CHARGE EUR 45.00 FOR REISSUE.
CHILD/INFANT DISCOUNTS APPLY.
NOTE -
/CHARGE APPLIES PER TRANSACTION - PER PERSON TO
ALL PASSENGER TYPES.
------------------------------
NO-SHOWS FOR A FLIGHT ARE CONSIDERED A
CANCELLATION AFTER DEPARTURE AND CHANGES ARE NOT
PERMITTED.
-----------------------------
----REPRICING CONDITIONS ----
A. BEFORE DEPARTURE OF JOURNEY WHEN THE FISRT
FARE COMPONENT IS CHANGED THE ITINERARY MUST BE
RE-PRICED USING CURRENT FARES IN EFFECT ON THE
DATE THE TICKET IS REISSUED.
B.BEFORE DEPARTURE OF JOURNEY WHEN CHANGES ARE TO
BOOKING CODE ONLY IN THE FIRST FARE COMPONENT AND
RESULT IN A HIGHER FARE THE ITINERARY MUST BE RE-
PRICED USING HISTORICAL FARES IN EFFECT ON THE
PREVIOUS TICKETING DATE OR USING CURRENT FARE IN
EFFECT ON THE DATE THE TICKET IS REISSUED -
WICHEVER IS LOWER.
C. BEFORE DEPARTURE OF JOURNEY WHEN THERE ARE NO
CHANGES TO THE FIRST FARE COMPONENT BUT OTHER
FARE COMPONENTS ARE CHANGED THE ITINERARY MUST BE
RE-PRICED USING HISTORICAL FAERS IN EFFECT ON THE
PREVIOUS TICKETING DATE OR USING CURRENT FARES IN
EFFECT ON THE DATE THE TICKET IS REISSUED -
WHICHEVER IS LOWER.
D. AFTER DEPARTURE OF JOURNEY THE ITINERARY MUST
BE RE-PRICED USING HISTORICAL FARES IN EFFECT ON
THE PREVIOUS TICKETING DATE.
-----------------------------------------------
NEW TICKET MAY BE EQUAL OR HIGHER THAN PREVIOUS
AND MUST COMPLY WITH ALL PROVISIONS OF THE NEW
FARE BEING APPLIED.
-----------------------------------------------
WHEN THE ITINERARY RESULT IN A HIGHER FARE THE
DIFFERENCE WILL BE COLLECTED. ANY APPLICABLE
CHANGE FEE STILL APPLIES.
-----------------------------------------------
WHEN THE NEW ITINERARY RESULTS IN A LOWER FARE
THE CHANGE FEE APPLIES AND NO CREDIT OF THE
RESIDUAL AMOUNT WILL BE MADE.
-----------------------------------------------
NO-SHOW FOR A FLIGHT ARE CONSIDERED A
CANCELLATION AFTER DEPARTURE AND CHANGES ARE NOT
PERMITTED.
-----------------------------------------------
TICKET IS NOT TRANSFEREABLE TO ANOTHER PERSON

fareRules.title: Ticket Endorsements END
fareRules.text:
TICKET ENDORSEMENT
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED   NOTE - RULE M500 IN IPRG100
APPLIES
WITHIN EUROPE FOR O- TYPE FARES
THE ORIGINAL AND THE REISSUED TICKET MUST BE ANNOTATED -
21 NOEND/CHG RST/REF NOPER - IN THE ENDORSEMENT BOX.
AND - THE ORIGINAL AND THE REISSUED TICKET MUST BE
ANNOTATED - RESTRICTIONS APPLY - IN THE FORM OF
PAYMENT BOX.

fareRules.title: Children Discounts CHD
fareRules.text:
CHILDREN DISCOUNTS
UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED   NOTE - GENERAL RULE DOES NOT
APPLY
ACCOMPANIED CHILD 2-11 - CHARGE 100 PERCENT OF THE FARE.
TICKETING CODE - BASE FARE CODE PLUS CH.
MUST BE ACCOMPANIED ON ALL FLIGHTS IN SAME COMPARTMENT
AT THIS RULE BY ADULT 12 OR OLDER
OR - UNACCOMPANIED CHILD 5-11 - CHARGE 100 PERCENT OF THE
FARE.
TICKETING CODE - BASE FARE CODE PLUS CH
OR - INFANT UNDER 2 WITH A SEAT - CHARGE 100 PERCENT OF
THE FARE.
TICKETING CODE - BASE FARE CODE PLUS IN.
MUST BE ACCOMPANIED ON ALL FLIGHTS IN SAME
COMPARTMENT AT THIS RULE BY ADULT 12 OR OLDER
OR - INFANT UNDER 2 WITHOUT A SEAT - CHARGE 10 PERCENT OF
THE FARE.
TICKETING CODE - BASE FARE CODE PLUS IN.
MUST BE ACCOMPANIED ON ALL FLIGHTS IN SAME
COMPARTMENT AT THIS RULE BY ADULT 12 OR OLDER.

fareRules.title: Tour Conductor Discounts TUC
fareRules.text:
TOUR CONDUCTOR DISCOUNTS
NONE UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED

fareRules.title: Agent Discounts AGT
fareRules.text:
AGENT DISCOUNTS
NONE UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED

fareRules.title: All Other Discounts DSC
fareRules.text:
ALL OTHER DISCOUNTS
NONE UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED

TOURS
NONE UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED

VOLUNTARY CHANGES
DO A CATEGORY 31 SPECIFIC TEXT ENTRY TO VIEW CONTENTS
ALSO REFERENCE 16 PENALTIES - FOR ADDITIONAL CHANGE INFORMATION
